definition: Qingshan district of Wuhan city 武漢市|武汉市[Wu3 han4 shi4], Hubei/Qingshan district of Baotou city 包頭市|包头市[Bao1 tou2 shi4], Inner Mongolia
abbr. for 青海[Qing1 hai3], Qinghai Province
mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable
lit. green hills and clear waters/pleasant country scene (idiom)
Qingshan district of Wuhan city 武漢市|武汉市[Wu3 han4 shi4], Hubei/Qingshan district of Baotou city 包頭市|包头市[Bao1 tou2 shi4], Inner Mongolia
Qingshanhu district of Nanchang city 南昌市, Jiangxi
Qingshanhu district of Nanchang city 南昌市, Jiangxi
While the green hills last, there'll be wood to burn (idiom). Where there's life there's hope.
pinyin: liu2 de5 qing1 shan1 zai4 , bu4 pa4 mei2 chai2 shao1
containing_words.word: 留得青山在，不怕没柴烧

sentences.english: If you have been to Yangshuo, you must have been surprised by its green mountains and clear rivers.
sentences.chinese: 如果你曾经去过阳朔，你一定惊讶于那里青山碧水。

sentences.english: Our School stands on the ground of the Cheung Ching Estate among greeny hills and waters.
sentences.chinese: 我们的学校，迄立在青山绿水的长青邨。

sentences.english: We were charmed with the blue hills and green streams here.
sentences.chinese: 我们陶醉在这里的绿水青山之中。

sentences.english: My Mary's asleep by thy murmuring stream.
sentences.chinese: 轻轻地流，甜美的亚顿河，你流过碧坡青山。

sentences.english: Would gush, flush, green these mountains and these valleys.
sentences.chinese: 将奋力喷出，冲刷涤荡，灌绿青山和这些山谷。

sentences.english: Dost know of such a place, lad, as Kingsbere-sub-Greenhill?
sentences.chinese: 小伙子，你知道不知道青山下的金斯伯尔这个地方？

sentences.english: Keeping water clean, mountain green, sky clear and harmony.
sentences.chinese: 为广东人民留绿水青山，存碧海蓝天，共享和谐。

sentences.english: Ever green mountains verdure the accompanying distance between us.
sentences.chinese: 青山不老翠绿着我们相知相伴的距离。

sentences.english: It is accessible from the public pedestrian footbridges at Castle Peak Road and On Shun Street.
sentences.chinese: 可由青山公路及安信街的公众行人天桥前往。

sentences.english: So desolate are the blue hills and green streams.
sentences.chinese: 绿水青山却是一片苍凉。

sentences.english: Therefore, I reluctantly looked back, it is a desolate lies.
sentences.chinese: 所以我恋恋不舍回头张望，绿水青山却是一片苍凉。

sentences.english: Still in the Castle Peak, Jiduoxiyanggong?
sentences.chinese: 青山依旧在，几度夕阳红？

sentences.english: However, I am very sure that the mountain in front of me must recognize her baby.
sentences.chinese: 但是，眼前这青山定是依然识得我。

sentences.english: It is accessible from Castle Peak Road and Yuen Lung Street.
sentences.chinese: 可由青山道及元龍街前往。

sentences.english: Mr. Muir of Victoria, Canada visited Daqingshan with his Taiji group.
sentences.chinese: 加拿大维多利亚太极拳团由戈登先生带领访问大青山。

definition: Baiyun district of Guiyang city 貴陽市|贵阳市[Gui4 yang2 shi4], Guizhou/Baiyun district of Guangzhou city 廣州市|广州市[Guang3 zhou1 shi4], Guangdong
lit. green hills and clear waters/pleasant country scene (idiom)
Hsiushui township in Changhua county 彰化縣|彰化县[Zhang1 hua4 xian4], Taiwan
Taoyuan county in Changde 常德[Chang2 de2], Hunan/Taoyuan township in Kaohsiung county 高雄縣|高雄县[Gao1 xiong2 xian4], southwest Taiwan
Nanshan or Namsan, common place name/Nanshan district of Shenzhen City 深圳市, Guangdong
Cuiluan district of Yichun city 伊春市[Yi1 chun1 shi4], Heilongjiang
mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable
